title: Thorns and Forgiveness
description: Determined to save my mother from her disastrous marriage, I sold my pride for a second chance with Hamilton Beauregard. Jack was convinced I could mend his family, but my heart refused to forgive.Hamilton broke me. He betrayed me.He made me fall in love with a lie.While trying to figure out my feelings, we all had to navigate my mother’s toxic sham of a marriage and Joseph’s deteriorating façade. My stepfather was dangerous. Deadly. During a tragic moment of weakness, his evil bloomed to life, and someone died.Hamilton is the only way I’ll survive.
author: Coralee June
